thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 4 of 289
thread.title: Jerry

author: Jerry
title: Jerry
text: I tried for 2 weeks to get tickets and talk with a live person at other ticket brokers ( stub hub, ticketmasters ) with no response. I called TicketCity and got a live person, he had same tickets as was listed on web. I purchased and received tickets 3 days later by FedEx and updates by email of shipment. The 'live' person on the phone gave me his direct number and name if I had any problems or would like to make future purchases. I will definitely be using TicketCity in the future. Great job of delivering and presenting your service.
